hero.title: AI solutions for real-world applications
hero.subtitle: We specialize in cutting-edge artificial intelligence solutions, from natural language processing to computer vision, helping businesses transform their operations and unlock new possibilities.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We work across several key domains of AI

nlp.title: Natural Language Processing (NLP)
nlp.shortDescription: We design robust NLP and generative AI systems for multilingual, high-volume, and sensitive environments.
nlp.description: We design robust NLP and generative AI systems for multilingual, high-volume, and sensitive environments. Our expertise covers text classification, entity extraction, summarization, document parsing, and large language model integration or local deployment.
useCases: Entity extraction and named entity recognition (NER)
projects: Built multilingual NLP pipeline for international humanitarian organization
Developed entity extraction system for banking compliance
Deployed privacy-preserving LLM solution for enterprise document processing

computerVision.title: Computer Vision
computerVision.shortDescription: We build advanced vision and generative vision models that bring structure and insight to image and video data.
computerVision.description: We build advanced vision and generative vision models that bring structure and insight to image and video data. Our solutions include object detection, image classification, video tagging, image generation, and custom multimodal pipelines.
projects: Developed real-time object detection system for manufacturing quality control
Built video analysis platform for media content categorization
Created custom image classification model for medical imaging application

ml.title: Machine Learning (ML)
ml.shortDescription: We solve predictive and analytical challenges across structured and unstructured data.
ml.description: We solve predictive and analytical challenges across structured and unstructured data. Our solutions include tabular ML, anomaly detection, forecasting, and classical ML solutions tailored to your business needs.
projects: Developed fraud detection system for fintech company
Built demand forecasting model for retail supply chain
Created anomaly detection system for IoT sensor networks

graphML.title: Graph Machine Learning
graphML.shortDescription: We use graph-based intelligence to reveal hidden relationships and enable complex reasoning over connected data.
graphML.description: We use graph-based intelligence to reveal hidden relationships and enable complex reasoning over connected data. Our expertise includes graph ML, link prediction, hybrid pipelines, and knowledge graph applications.
projects: Built knowledge graph system for research organization
Developed recommendation engine using graph neural networks
Created hybrid graph-ML pipeline for social network analysis

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Cutting-edge AI products designed to transform how businesses understand and interact with data while maintaining the highest standards of privacy.

vibeMonitor.title: VibeMonitor
vibeMonitor.subtitle: Social Media Intelligence
vibeMonitor.description: Advanced report generation from social media platforms including Reddit, Twitter, and LinkedIn. Our AI understands and analyzes videos, audio, text, and images to provide comprehensive insights into public sentiment and trends.
features: Multi-platform social media monitoring (Reddit, Twitter, LinkedIn)
Multimedia content analysis (video, audio, text, images)

prism.title: PRISM
prism.subtitle: Privacy-Respecting Retrieval & Information Synthesis Machine
prism.description: A fully local, privacy-first AI platform that analyzes and summarizes diverse document types, supports multilingual processing, and provides verifiable, exportable insights—all while ensuring complete data control.
features: Supports text, media, emails, and multilingual content
Extracts metadata and structured data from documents
Answers include sources and confidence scores
Runs locally or in private cloud, with fine-tuning options

about.title: Our Team
about.subtitle: A team of tech experts with extensive experience in consulting and product development, delivering innovative solutions across diverse industries.
about.description: At Ethinc, we believe in the transformative power of artificial intelligence. Our team of experts combines deep technical knowledge with practical business understanding to deliver AI solutions that drive real results.
about.mission: Our mission is to democratize AI technology and make it accessible to businesses of all sizes.

nizar.name: Nizar Ghandri
nizar.bio: Former GenAI Tech Lead at UBS with extensive experience in AI for banking, telecommunications, and enterprise solutions. Expert in building scalable AI systems that drive real business value.
experience: GenAI Tech Lead at UBS - Leading AI initiatives in banking
AI Solutions Architect for telecommunications industry
Built scalable ML systems for enterprise clients
Expert in deploying production-grade AI systems

selim.name: Selim Fekih
selim.bio: AI consultant specializing in the humanitarian sector, with hands-on experience developing NLP solutions and privacy-focused analysis pipelines to address humanitarian challenges. Contributed to platforms like theDEEP and Reporter AI (reporterai.org), building multilingual and locally deployable NLP systems.
experience: AI Consultant for humanitarian organizations and crisis response platforms
Built and deployed NLP pipelines for theDEEP and Reporter AI
Designed privacy-preserving pipelines for sensitive humanitarian data

badis.name: Badis Machraoui
badis.bio: Focuses on the development of our platforms, including AI development, prompt engineering, and software backend. Dedicated to building robust, scalable systems that power our AI solutions.

cta.title: Interested in working with us?
cta.subtitle: Schedule a call and see how Ethinc's AI solutions can help your operations.

footer.description: AI solutions for real-world applications. From research to production, we help businesses unlock value and drive innovation with advanced, privacy-focused technology.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to the Ethinc website. By accessing and using this website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

section1.title: Website Use
section1.content: This website is provided for informational purposes about Ethinc and our capabilities. You may not use this website for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of this website at any time without notice.

section2.title: Intellectual Property
section2.content: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, images, and code, is the property of Ethinc and is protected by copyright and intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or use any content from this website without our express written permission.

section3.title: Disclaimer and Limitation of Liability
section3.content: This website and its content are provided 'as is' without any warranties, express or implied. Ethinc shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use of this website or reliance on the information provided. The information on this website is for general informational purposes and does not constitute professional advice.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Ethinc, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

section1.title: Information We Collect
section1.content: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, company name, and phone number when you contact us through our website or engage with our services. We collect this information only when voluntarily provided by you.

section2.title: How We Use Your Information
section2.content: We use your information to respond to inquiries, provide our services, communicate with you about projects, and improve our offerings. We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties.

section3.title: Data Security
section3.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.noCookies: We do not use cookies on this website.
cookies.content: Our website does not use cookies or similar tracking technologies. We do not collect any data through cookies, and your browsing experience is not tracked in any way. This means you can browse our site without any concerns about cookie-based tracking or data collection.
